description: Overwatch 2 Season 13 just kicked off with a new battle pass and a new collaboration event. The new crossover pulls in My Hero Academia, adding new skins, highlight intros, and more to the shop for a limited time. The event runs from October 17 to 30, with 30 new cosmetic items in the store, along with five sprays and a weapon charm that can be unlocked for free by completing matches during the event. The shop cosmetics are centered around the five legendary skins: All Might Reinhardt, Deku Tracer, Himiko Toga Kiriko, Tomura Shigaraki Reaper, and
title: All 30 Overwatch 2 My Hero Academia Skins And Cosmetics

description:
HBO's upcoming Dune prequel series, Dune: Prophecy, is set 10,000 years before the events of the films. The show will revolve around the Sisterhood that grew in power over time to become the Bene Gesserit. But in the new trailer for the series, the Sisterhood's very existence is threatened by a man whose only desire is to wipe them all out.

Vikings star Trav
title: Dune: Prophecy Trailer Reveals The Sisterhood's Greatest Enemy

description:
Ahead of Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 release on October 25, Activision has revealed new information about the game’s Zombies mode. This includes a deep-dive into all the main points of interest for both maps, updates to the HUD, map changes for Liberty Falls, and more.

Terminus and Liberty Falls are two brand-new Zombies maps arriving at launch, and both will feature their own storyline Easter egg quests. Since the reveal of these two maps, Treyarch has worked to make improvements prior to launch, which includes HUD changes and map updates to Liberty Falls.

Following the map reveal at Call of Duty: Next, Liberty Falls was met with some community criticism, expressing that the map's design looked and felt too casual, lacking a darker, more-tra
title: CoD: Black Ops 6 Zombies - Check Out Liberty Falls And Terminus Map POIs
Nintendo's First Official Switch Joy-Con Charging Stand Launches Today (Cappy Not Included)

description: With Fortnitemares ongoing, we're approaching the end of Fortnite Chapter 5 Season 4. As with last year, we're expecting a little something extra before we head to Chapter 6, though--a new iteration of Fortnite OG will run for a month between the end of Chapter 5 and the beginning of Chapter 6. This isn't officially announced yet, but it's been heavily rumored and, if you believe the leaked 2024 roadmap--and you should since it's been right so far--another round of Fortnite OG is on the way. While Fortnite battle royale, Rocket Racing, Festival, and Lego all have plenty in store for this Oc
title: Fortnite OG 2: Start Date, Battle Pass, Leaks, And Rumors

description:
Arriving In 2025


Not only did Remedy pull the curtains back on its Control spin-off FBC: Firebreaker, the developer also added a surprise by sharing that it will be available day one on Xbox Game Pass. In fact, it was one of five titles that will launch on the subscription service that Microsoft unveiled as part of the Xbox Partner Preview.

Joining Remedy's first-ever multiplayer game--which sees three players teaming up to take on the Hiss--as an Xbox Game Pass day-one launch are Eternal Strands, Subnautica 2, Wheel World, and Wuchang: Fallen Feathers. Each
title: Xbox Game Pass Getting Five More Day-One Launches, Including Control Multiplayer Spin-Off

description: Dbrand's Darkplates are among the best third-party console covers for the PS5. Up until now, Darkplates have only been available for the original PS5 and PS5 Digital, but now PS5 Slim users can change the look of their console with Darkplates, too. The new PS5 Slim Darkplates are only available in black at the moment, but you can purchase add-ons to give your PS5 Slim a unique look, including skins to wrap around the middle of the console, lightstrips, and a custom-designed stand. Dbrand is offering a launch deal that drops the starting price for a pair of Darkplates to $60 (was $70) for PS5 Slim and PS5 Slim Digital.
title: Dbrand's Awesome PS5 Console Covers Are Now Available For PS5 Slim

description:
Hazelight Studios has announced that It Takes Two sold over 20 million copies since its release in 2021, and the developer has teased the title of its next game.

Over on Twitter, director Josef Fares said, "Getting a lot of questions about the next game. Here is a tease. It is a BRAND NEW IP called S**** ******N. Can’t wait to show it soon." Hazelight Studios followed up with a picture of a folder with the words "NEW IP" circled in yellow along with a mystery release date. The new game is also confirmed to be published by Electronics Arts again under the EA Originals banner.

Now that you mention it, think you dropped this in the office
title: It Takes Two Crosses 20 Million Copies Sold, Developer Teases Title Of Next Game

description:
The penultimate part of the Cobra Kai saga is coming this holiday season. Netflix's hit Cobra Kai Part 2 of Season 6 arrives November 15, bringing fans one step closer to the final chapter in the original Karate Kid series. These five episodes take us to the prestigious Sekai Taikai karate tournament with the show’s five remaining episodes scheduled to hit Netflix sometime in 2025.

At the end of Part 1, we saw that both Miyagi-Do and the new Cobra Kai qualified for the world championship. Daniel (Ralph Macchio) also discovered that Mr. Miyagi competed in the tournament after finding his bloodied headband. The realization put everything into question about his teachings and what Miyagi-Do was about.

"The first thing that you’re going to notice is we’re not in the Valley anymore. It's a totally different environment. The competitive space is different from previous All Valley tournaments," said c
title: Cobra Kai Season 6 Part 2 Kicks On To Netflix In November

description:
Horror games based on beloved movies are more popular than ever, even when you compare this era to the early Nintendo years when movie tie-ins were a lot more common. But most of these modern takes on famous horror monsters have gone in the same direction, for better or worse. While everyone else is offering asymmetrical horror multiplayer games, RetroRealms turns back the clock to offer a package more in line with those horror tie-ins of decades ago, and thanks to some charming nods to horror history and pixel-perfect platforming, it's an uncommon and intriguing ode to the horror genre.

As a product, RetroRealms is sold in a peculiar manner. RetroRealms Arcade is itself a free 3D hub space that you can explore in first-person, combining touches of a classic arcade with a horror museum. Within that space, you can purchase one or both 2D 16-bit platformers available at launch, Halloween and Ash vs. Evil Dead (AVED). For this review, I've played both games a
title: RetroRealms Review - A New Horror Multiverse Is Born

description:
Nearly three years ago, Tom Holland headlined Spider-Man: No Way Home opposite his two immediate predecessors, Andrew Garfield and Tobey Maguire, in what turned out to be the highest-grossing film that Sony has ever released. Holland hasn't exactly rushed back to the MCU since then, and he hasn't even made any cameos. Regardless, Holland is still on board for the next adventure of Peter Parker, and he's already read the script for Spider-Man 4.

"I read [the Spider-Man 4 script] three weeks ago and it really lit a fire in me," said Holland during his recent appearance on Rich Roll's YouTube show. "Zendaya and I sat down, read it together and we at times were bouncing around the living room like, 'This is a real movie worthy of the fans' respect.' But there's a few things we need to figure out befor
title: Spider-Man 4 Script "Really Lit A Fire In Me," Says Tom Holland

description: Check out the updates from the event!
title: Best Xbox Partner Preview Trailers 2024

description:
A new round-based multiplayer FPS, Blindfire, was announced during Xbox's most recent Partner Preview, and though multiplayer shooters are a dime a dozen, this one comes with a unique twist that helps to set it apart: It takes place almost entirely in the dark.

Blindfire will be available today in early access through the Xbox Game Preview program on both Xbox Series X|S and PC, and its novel premise looks to put an emphasis on "slower, more tactical play," according to an Xbox Wire blog. The game's multiplayer arenas are almost entirely shrouded in shadows. Since the noise and muzzle flash of firing a weapon is a dead giveaway, players will need to think strategically about when to engage the enemy. For an example of how important noise is in Blindfire
title: New Xbox Shooter Blindfire Takes Place Nearly Entirely In The Dark, Playable Today

description: Where's Batman when you really need him? HBO's The Penguin is a spin-off from The Batman, and the Dark Knight is nowhere to be found while there's a gang war underway between the Falcone and Maroni crime families. Oswald "Oz" Cobb (Colin Farrell) engineered the entire conflict to make himself the new kingpin of Gotham City. But as seen in the new mid-season trailer for The Penguin, Oz has a more formidable foe in Sofia Falcone (Cristin Milioti), the rightful heir of the Falcone family's empire.
title: The Penguin Mid-Season Trailer Sparks A War For Gotham City's Underworld

description:
Diablo 4: Vessel of Hatred has added the first post-launch class, Spiritborn. The Spiritborn challenges the spirit of four different animals to deal a variety of damage, depending on how you want to build. Combined with powerful passive abilities, Spiritborn offers a ton of options for making powerful builds, so long as you have a good understanding of each animal's specialties. Here's everything you need to know about the Spiritborn class in Diablo 4: Vessel of Hatred.

The four animal spirits
title: Diablo 4: Vessel Of Hatred - Spiritborn Class Guide

description:
Earlier this month, Bloober Team's remake of the survival horror classic Silent Hill 2 was met with critical acclaim. But it won't be long before the developer returns with an all-new title. During today's Xbox Partner Preview, Bloober Team unveiled the first teaser trailer for Cronos: The New Dawn, a new sci-fi survival-horror game that's coming next year.

Cronos: The New Dawn will be Bloober Team's first original survival-horror title, according to the studio, and it puts players in control of a Traveler. The player's character works for an "eni
title: Silent Hill 2 Remake Developer Reveals New Survival-Horror Game, Cronos: The New Dawn

description: Remedy Entertainment announces its three player co-operative first person shooter game set in the Federal Bureau of Control. Work your way through the Oldest House, where you'll be fending off the hiss. FBC: Firebreak does not have a release date at the moment.
title: FBC: Firebreak Reveal Trailer | Xbox Partner Preview 2024

description: From 505 Games comes a Chinese soulslike action game taking place in the late Ming Dynasty, where your characer will fight monsters using both weapons and magical spells. Wuchang: Fallen Feathers releaes sometime in 2025.
title: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers Trailer | Xbox Partner Preview 2024

description:
If your Halloween plans included firing up some scary video games, you might need to make room for one more. Today, during the Xbox Partner Preview event, Kinetic Games revealed that Phasmophobia--the co-op survival game where teams of ghost-hunters investigate paranormal activity--will launch in early access on consoles October 29.

Phasmophobia drops four players into a dark and deserted area--houses, campsites, prisons, etc.--and tasks them with identifying an otherworldly intruder from a list of 24 potential types. However, the ghost can become angered at the team's efforts and fly into a rage, hunting the players and sending them into the afterlife to join it.

Each challenge comes with a full set of ghost-hunting tools used to identify the spirit in question, from cameras that can pick up a spooky silhouett
title: Phasmophobia Coming To Haunt Consoles Just In Time For Halloween

description:
It was revealed a few years ago that Remedy's New Weird award-winner, 2019's Control, is getting a multiplayer spin-off (codenamed Condor) in addition to a true sequel. Today, during the Xbox Partner Preview, Remedy offered a debut look at this project, its first in the multiplayer space. FBC: Firebreak is a three-player first-person shooter that pits Federal Bureau of Control (FBC) agents against the Remedy Connected Universe's creepy enemies infected by the Hiss.

You can check out a reveal trailer below for FBC: Firebreak. You'll notice it doesn't seem as though players will reprise the role of Jesse Faden. Instead, they'll answer the
title: Remedy's Control Multiplayer Game Revealed As FBC Firebreak

description: The ghost hunting phenomena, Phasmaphobia, is finally making its way to consoles October 29. Turn off the lights, turn on your microphones, and get ready to talk directly to ghosts with three of your friends in this cooperative ghost hunting detection game.
title: Phasmaphobia Console Trailer | Xbox Partner Preview 2024

description:
The God of War TV series at Prime Video is undergoing a major change. A new report confirmed that Sony Pictures TV and Amazon MGM Studios are starting over on the show from scratch after a trio of the show's key creative team left the project.

Deadline reported that showrunner and executive producer Rafe Judkins has left the series, alongside executive producers Hawk Ostby and Mark Fergus. They are said to have submitted multiple scripts for the show, and one source said the scripts were "praised by both Sony and Prime." However, the decision apparently came down to "move in a different creative direction."

The God of War series was announced in December 2022 but never got any meaningful development updates since then, prompting fans to wonder and worry about its status.
title: The God Of War TV Show Is Starting Over From Scratch - Report

description: In Mistall Hunter, players choose between various classes in a third person extraction action RPG where you'll be dodging away from fantastical monsters solo or with teammates. MIstfall Hunters is currently set to release in 2025.
title: Mistfall Hunter Trailer | Xbox Partner Preview 2024

description: Subnautica 2 is the next installment in the underwater survival series that puts its players to explore an alien planet made entirely of water. The game is expected to go into early access in 2025.
title: Subnautica 2 Early Access Trailer | Xbox Partner Preview 2024

description: RGG Studios' new grand adventure sees its iconic unhinged anti-hero Goro Majima step into the shoes of being a pirate. Yes, a pirate. The all new entry in the Like A Dragon series will have you swashbuckling through naval battles, and doing all things a pirate does, but as a member of the Yakuza. Like A Dragon: Pirate Yakuza In Hawaii is expected to release February 21, 2024.
title: Like A Dragon: Pirate Yakuza In Hawaii Launch Trailer | Xbox Partner Preview 2024

description: After their success with Silent Hill 2, Bloober Team is back with another horror title. This time, we see someone in a suit with claws and a gun facing against zombie-like creatures in the upcoming Cronos The New Dawn. Cronos the New Dawn is set to release sometime in 2025.
title: Cronos The New Dawn Trailer | Xbox Partner Preview 2024

description:
While 2024 is almost over, it looks like Xbox still has some big news to share before the start of a new year. The Xbox Partner Preview showcase is now live, and like previous events, this is a short but informative look at new and upcoming games from third-party studios like Remedy Entertainment, Sega, 505, and several others.

Microsoft has confirmed that there'll be over a dozen new trailers shown throughout the 25-minute show, and if you're looking to check out all of the big announcements, we'll be running a live look at everything as they're revealed. For updates, you can hit the F5 key for a quick refresh.

If you are interested in watching along, you can check out this YouTube link for the livestream.

As for what you can expect from this showcase, it has been confirm
title: Xbox Partner Preview October 2024: All The Biggest Announcements And Games

description: Remedy Entertainment thrusts us back into the halls of the Federal Bureau of Control. Alan Wake 2's new expansion, The Lake House, infuses survival horror into the FBC, hinting at how Alan Wake's world is bleeding into the Remedy Connected Universe. The Expansion is expected to release October 22.
title: Alan Wake 2: The Lake House Launch Trailer | Xbox Partner Preview 2024

description:
The upcoming second Alan Wake 2 expansion, The Lake House, will introduce new monsters, a new playable character, and new weapons, according to glimpses seen in today's trailer from the Xbox Partner Preview. However, it's also doing something that looks back in a sense, while still looking ahead to future Remedy projects. The Lake House will tie in closely to Control, Remedy's 2019 game, as well as its sequel, which is coming out sometime in the future.

In the new trailer, you'll see players now take on the role of Agent Estevez, a Federal Bureau of Control agent who was seen quite a bit in the Alan Wake 2 story, but only now will she be playable for the first time. H
title: Alan Wake 2 The Lake House DLC Release Date Announced, Ties In Closely With Control

description:
Call of Duty's awful user-interface is finally getting overhauled next week. As previously announced by Activision, an update is arriving to Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone to introduce the new UI and allow for preload of Call of Duty: Black Ops 6. Here is everything you need to know about the download process and new UI design.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • How to download the UI/Black Ops 6 update

How to download the UI/Black Ops 6 update
title: Call Of Duty's New UI Is Arriving Soon With The Black Ops 6 Preload

description:
A new line of Pokemon Crocs have been unveiled, because if you gotta catch 'em all, you might as well wear something comfy on your feet. The line will launch with four styles that highlight specific Pokemon--Jigglypuff, Snorlax, Charizard, and Gengar--and there'll be a range of Jibbitz charms to collect as well.

These will be available at at Foot Locker, Kids Foot Locker, and Champs Sports, with pricing starting at $55 for grade-school styles and $70 for adult sizes. As for the Jibbitz charms, these are cute little accessories based on several of the most popular Pokemon, like Charmander, Pikachu, and Psyduck.

Here's a closer look at them, and in case you missed it, Batman fans can also pick up a pair of Crocs influenced by the 1989 Batmobile, the <
title: Pokemon Crocs Are Real And You Gotta Wear 'Em All

description:
2K Games has unveiled its first-ever free-to-play live-service shooter, Project Ethos, via an announcement trailer and a community playtest that anyone can take part in.

Developed by 31st Union, 2K describes Project Ethos as a "third-person roguelike hero shooter" with a focus on randomized upgrades (called Evolutions) that allow players to tailor each hero to their specific playstyle.

"Shape your playstyle every match through Evolutions: powerful, semi-randomized, upgrades unique to each hero," 2K shared in a press release announcing the game. "Evolve a sniper into a close-range skirmisher, or a support role into a powerful lone wolf. Build your hero in real-time to suit your personal playstyle."

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: 2K Games Unveils New Hero Shooter Project Ethos, And You Can Play It Today

description:
Steel oneself for a new challenge in Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2's Operation mode with the arrival of Lethal difficulty. It's one of the biggest additions to the game as part of patch 4.0.

That's not all, either. The update--available now--introduces a new Operation named Termination as well as a photo mode. Termination takes place on Kaduku, and Space Marine 2 players can test out the Lethal difficulty there. Just be prepared for deadlier, enraged Majoris foes; limited refills on ammo crates; and the fact finishers must be executed near squadmates to receive armor restoration.
title: Space Marine 2 Introduces Lethal Difficulty For Operations And Photo Mode - Full Patch Notes

description:
Former 30-year Sony veteran Shawn Layden, who served as one of Sony's top gaming bosses during his tenure, has commented on the state of video game hardware advancements. He said at Gamescom Asia this week that he believes increased power alone no longer moves the needle.

"It has plateaued. We're at the stage of hardware development that I call, 'Only dogs can hear the difference,'" he said, as reported by VGC. "If you're playing your game and sunlight is coming through your window onto your TV, you're not seeing any ray tracing. It has to be super optimal… you have to have an 8K monitor in a dark room to see these things."

Layden went on to say Microsoft and Sony are "fighting over teraflops," but he believes this is not the right approach. Instead, he wants to see game companies "compete on content" because he believes video game consoles have "reached
title: The PS6 And Next Xbox Shouldn't Fight Over Teraflops, Former Sony Boss Says

description:
Bohemia Interactive first announced that Arma 4 was in development in 2022 during a livestream. Since then, there's been little news about the next mainline installment in the Arma franchise. But during Bohemia Interactive's 25th-anniversary concert earlier this week, fans who were in attendance got to see the live announcement that Arma 4 will be released in 2027.

Bohemia also streamed the anniversary concert on YouTube, which featured the Czech National Symphony Orchestra playing selections from Arma, DayZ, Ylands, and Vigor. As reported by
title: Arma 4 Release Window Surprise-Announced During Live Concert

description:
The Epic Games Store continues to give away a free game each week, and this week is another nice find with a price that can't be beaten. Every Thursday at 8 AM PT / 11 AM ET, Epic offers at least one free PC game (and sometimes even as many as two or three). All you need to do to claim the free games is create a free Epic account and enable two-factor authentication. You have a week to add the freebies to your library before the new one(s) take their place. At this point, Epic has given away hundreds of free games, and there's no sign that the program will stop any time soon. We keep this article up to date weekly to highlight both the current free games and next week's offerings.

Current free games at Epic
title: This Week's Epic Games Store Freebies Offer Superhero And Trading Card Action

description:
After a few days of rumors, Universal Studios announced on Thursday that its highly anticipated fourth theme park, Universal Epic Universe, will officially open on May 22, 2025. The massive interlocked resort will have five worlds, each with its unique theme, tied to a particular franchise under the Universal umbrella--Celestial Park, The Wizarding World of Harry Potter: Ministry of Magic, Super Nintendo World, How to Train Your Dragon: Isle of Berk, and Dark Universe.

The opening of Epic Universe will transform Universal Orlando Resort into a possible weeklong vacation destination comprised of not just the parks, but 11 hotels that are aiming to be destinations themselves. Among them is the Helios
title: It's Mario Time When Universal's Epic Universe Opens In May 2025

description:
EA has announced a significant change for Plants vs. Zombies 3, confirming that the game is undergoing a "major overhaul" and will be taken offline as the developer reconfigures the game.

Plants vs. Zombies 3 had a soft-launch earlier this year, and EA said it feels grateful for the "enthusiasm and feedback" that players sent in during this early testing period. With that feedback in mind, EA said it has decided to "re-tool the game" with the aim of making an "even better" experience.
title: Plants Vs. Zombies 3 Getting Major Overhaul, Will Be Delisted Soon

description:
During a Gamescom Asia panel, former PlayStation boss Shawn Layden spoke about the current state of the gaming industry and how the disappearance of AA studios had contributed to a "collapse of creativity" in modern games. Layden explained how the rise in development costs had led to studios placing a stronger emphasis on post-launch monetization plans and following trends to remain risk-adverse.

"You didn't worry so much about the end piece, for better or for worse. Of course back then you didn't make a game for millions [of] dollars. So your risk tolerance was fairly high, Layden said (via GamesIndustry.Biz). "Today, the entry costs for making a AAA game is in triple-digit millions now. I think, naturally, risk tolerance drops. And you're [looking] at sequels, you're looking at copycats, because the finance guys who draw the line say, 'Well, if Fortnite made
title: Former PlayStation Boss Talks About The "Collapse Of Creativity" In AAA Game Development

description:
Netflix has released the first trailer for The Electric State, the next movie from Avengers directors Joe and Anthony Russo. The film takes place in the wake of a robot uprising in an alternate-universe '90s America. It's a truly bizarre and wild trailer that's best experienced without knowing too much.

So go ahead, check out the trailer below.

Millie Bobby Brown plays the lead, an orphaned teen who travels across the American West with an eclectic band of friends, including a cartoon-inspired robot. And yes, that seems to be Mr. Peanut with a crowbar in one of the scenes. The film also stars Chris Pratt, Ke Huy Quan, Jason Alexander, Woody Norman, Gi
title: Next Movie From Avengers Directors Gets First Trailer You Have To Watch--It's Wild

description:
Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson, Star Wars and Star Trek writer-director JJ Abrams, and superhero movie writer Zak Penn are teaming up for a new project.

Johnson shared a photo on Instagram of a dinner meeting the three had recently where they talked about "our passion for movies and storytelling." He teased the upcoming project, whatever it might be, saying, "Yup, this one is gonna be fun." Johnson said the project has been "years in the making."
title: The Rock Teams Up With JJ Abrams And Superhero Writer Zak Penn For New Project

description:
It's not uncommon for some online services or memberships to make it exceedingly difficult for users to unsubscribe or quit. The prevailing business theory behind that was apparently meant to dissuade consumers from going through with that final step. Now, the Federal Trade Commission has announced a new rule that is meant to make it much easier for people to cancel those services.

The FTC's Click To Cancel rule calls for sellers to streamline the process that lets customers end their subscriptions or enrollment. Whether that will work in practice remains to be seen, but it's a positive step forward for those who have been calling for the change.

"Too often, businesses make people jump through endless hoops just to cancel a subscription," said Commission Chair Lina M. Khan in a statement. "The FTC's
title: It May Soon Be Much Easier To Cancel Your Subscriptions (We Hope)

description:
Kuwait has denied the release of Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 in the country, and in response, Activision is cancelling all preorders. Refunds are available at the original point of purchase.

In a statement, Activision said the game "has not been approved for release" in Kuwait, and as such, it won't be available on October 25 in the region. "We remain hopeful that local authorities will reconsider, and allow players in Kuwait to enjoy this all-new experience in the Black Ops series," Activision said.

The exact reason why Kuwait did not approve Black Ops 6 for release is unknown. However, some speculate it has to do with the portrayal of the Middle East given that Black Ops 6's campaign focuses on the Gulf War. Saddam Hussein has been featured in advertisements for Bla
title: Black Ops 6 Won't Be Released In Kuwait, Preorders Canceled And Refunds Issued
